sentences.sContent: The larynx, or voice box, sits lower in the throat in humans than in chimps, one of several .
sentences.sContent_eng: The larynx, or voice box, sits lower in the throat in humans than in chimps, one of several .
sentences.sCn: 人类的喉（亦称音箱），其在咽部的位置要低于黑猩猩，这是人们能说话的原因之一。

sentences.sContent: Objective: To investigate the emergency treatment and experience of penetrating larynx injury.
sentences.sContent_eng: Objective: To investigate the emergency treatment and experience of penetrating larynx injury.
sentences.sCn: 目的：探讨开放性喉外伤的急诊治疗方法和经验。

sentences.sContent: A series of detect confirm this cambium is belonged to malign, made complete larynx resection finally.
sentences.sContent_eng: A series of detect confirm this cambium is belonged to malign, made complete larynx resection finally.
sentences.sCn: 一系列的检测证实此新生组织属恶性，最终作了全喉切除术。

trans.tranOther: the part in your throat where your voice is produced
